ygData.subject: Re: Quick question re: choices of primary & secondary w eapons
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Do you find this does a good job compared to Anthem? I tried it for a while with my regular group and the tanks didnt seem to think it was as effective as
ygData.messageBody:
On Sun, Jun 13/99, "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...> wrote:

> .... At
> level 36 you can stack chant of battle and celerity to give the whole party
> a STR, DEX, AC, and AGI boost.

Do you find this does a good job compared to Anthem? I tried it for a
while with my regular group and the tanks didnt seem to think it was as
effective as just Anthem. Wish Anthem and Celerity stacked, would make a
real nice combo.


--
